an6.10:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an6.10:1.2: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno, kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.10:1.3: “yo so, bhante, ariyasavako agataphalo vinnatasasano, so katamena viharena bahulam viharati”ti?
an6.10:2.1: “Yo so, mahanama, ariyasavako agataphalo vinnatasasano, so imina viharena bahulam viharati.
an6.10:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an6.10:2.4: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako tathagatam anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.10:2.5: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti tathagatam arabbha.
an6.10:2.6: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an6.10:2.7: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an6.10:2.9: ‘ariyasavako visamagataya pajaya samappatto viharati, sabyapajjaya pajaya abyapajjo viharati, dhammasotam samapanno buddhanussatim bhaveti’.
an6.10:3.1: Puna caparam, mahanama, ariyasavako dhammam anussarati:
an6.10:3.2: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti.
an6.10:3.3: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako dhammam anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.10:3.4: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti dhammam arabbha.
an6.10:3.5: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an6.10:3.6: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an6.10:3.8: ‘ariyasavako visamagataya pajaya samappatto viharati, sabyapajjaya pajaya abyapajjo viharati, dhammasotam samapanno dhammanussatim bhaveti’.
an6.10:4.1: Puna caparam, mahanama, ariyasavako sangham anussarati:
an6.10:4.2: ‘suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, ujuppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, nayappatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, samicippatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala esa bhagavato savakasangho ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa’ti.
an6.10:4.3: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako sangham anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.10:4.4: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti sangham arabbha.
an6.10:4.5: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an6.10:4.6: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an6.10:4.8: ‘ariyasavako visamagataya pajaya samappatto viharati, sabyapajjaya pajaya abyapajjo viharati, dhammasotam samapanno sanghanussatim bhaveti’.
an6.10:5.1: Puna caparam, mahanama, ariyasavako attano silani anussarati akhandani acchiddani asabalani akammasani bhujissani vinnuppasatthani aparamatthani samadhisamvattanikani.
an6.10:5.2: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako silam anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.10:5.3: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti silam arabbha.
an6.10:5.4: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an6.10:5.5: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an6.10:5.7: ‘ariyasavako visamagataya pajaya samappatto viharati, sabyapajjaya pajaya abyapajjo viharati, dhammasotam samapanno silanussatim bhaveti’.
an6.10:6.1: Puna caparam, mahanama, ariyasavako attano cagam anussarati:
an6.10:6.3: Yoham maccheramalapariyutthitaya pajaya vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasami muttacago payatapani vosaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato’ti.
an6.10:6.4: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako cagam anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.10:6.5: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti cagam arabbha.
an6.10:6.6: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an6.10:6.7: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an6.10:6.9: ‘ariyasavako visamagataya pajaya samappatto viharati, sabyapajjaya pajaya abyapajjo viharati, dhammasotam samapanno caganussatim bhaveti’.
an6.10:7.1: Puna caparam, mahanama, ariyasavako devatanussatim bhaveti:
an6.10:7.2: ‘santi deva catumaharajika, santi deva tavatimsa, santi deva yama, santi deva tusita, santi deva nimmanaratino, santi deva paranimmitavasavattino, santi deva brahmakayika, santi deva tatuttari.
an6.10:7.3: Yatharupaya saddhaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna, mayhampi tatharupa saddha samvijjati.
an6.10:7.4: Yatharupena silena samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna, mayhampi tatharupam silam samvijjati.
an6.10:7.5: Yatharupena sutena samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna, mayhampi tatharupam sutam samvijjati.
an6.10:7.6: Yatharupena cagena samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna, mayhampi tatharupo cago samvijjati.
an6.10:7.7: Yatharupaya pannaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna, mayhampi tatharupa panna samvijjati’ti.
an6.10:7.8: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako attano ca tasanca devatanam saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.10:7.9: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti ta devata arabbha.
an6.10:7.10: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an6.10:7.11: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an6.10:7.13: ‘ariyasavako visamagataya pajaya samappatto viharati, sabyapajjaya pajaya abyapajjo viharati, dhammasotam samapanno devatanussatim bhaveti’.
an6.10:8.1: Yo so, mahanama, ariyasavako agataphalo vinnatasasano, so imina viharena bahulam viharati”ti.
